Card.Name: Birds of Paradise
Card.RulesText: Flying {T}: Add one mana of any color.

Card.Name: Tinder Wall
Card.RulesText: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Sacrifice Tinder Wall: Add {R}{R}. {R}, Sacrifice Tinder Wall: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

Card.Name: Vine Trellis
Card.RulesText: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {T}: Add {G}.

Card.Name: Wall of Roots
Card.RulesText: Defender Put a -0/-1 counter on Wall of Roots: Add {G}. Activate only once each turn.

Card.Name: Tin Street Hooligan
Card.RulesText: When Tin Street Hooligan enters the battlefield, if {G} was spent to cast it, destroy target artifact.

Card.Name: Eternal Witness
Card.RulesText: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

Card.Name: Cunning Sparkmage
Card.RulesText: Haste {T}: Cunning Sparkmage deals 1 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Kitchen Finks
Card.RulesText: When Kitchen Finks enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)

Card.Name: Stampeding Wildebeests
Card.RulesText: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Bloodbraid Elf
Card.RulesText: Haste Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

Card.Name: Vengevine
Card.RulesText: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Card.Name: Shard Phoenix
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Sacrifice Shard Phoenix: It deals 2 damage to each creature without flying. {R}{R}{R}: Return Shard Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

Card.Name: Shivan Wurm
Card.RulesText: Trample When Shivan Wurm enters the battlefield, return a red or green creature you control to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Shivan Dragon
Card.RulesText: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Aether Vial
Card.RulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on Aether Vial. {T}: You may put a creature card with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on Aether Vial from your hand onto the battlefield.

Card.Name: Naturalize
Card.RulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

Card.Name: Incinerate
Card.RulesText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

Card.Name: Lightning Bolt
Card.RulesText: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Saproling Cluster
Card.RulesText: {1}, Discard a card: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. Any player may activate this ability.

Card.Name: Flamebreak
Card.RulesText: Flamebreak deals 3 damage to each creature without flying and each player. Creatures dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

Card.Name: Pattern of Rebirth
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search their library for a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Kyren Negotiations
Card.RulesText: Tap an untapped creature you control: Kyren Negotiations deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

Card.Name: Frenzied Tilling
Card.RulesText: Destroy target land. Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Fireblast
Card.RulesText: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

Card.Name: Pyrokinesis
Card.RulesText: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

Card.Name: Gaea's Cradle
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {G} for each creature you control.

Card.Name: Wooded Foothills
Card.RulesText: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wooded Foothills: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Card.Name: Taiga
Card.RulesText: ({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)
